articles.title: BarlowGirl Delivers The Must-Have Christmas Album Of 2008
articles.description: Making a Christmas record has been a dream of the girls since their youth, so the recent release of Home For Christmas has definitely had BarlowGirl ready for the holiday season for quite some time. ” “ The must have Christmas album of 2008! Bottom line - BarlowGirl delivers the must have Christmas album of 2008. ” - About. com For more information about BarlowGirl and for the most recent happenings and future tour dates, please visit BarlowGirl. com or Myspace. com / barlowgirl.

articles.title: Congratulations Third Day - Third Day Wins First American Music Award
articles.description: Due to a non stop touring schedule, band members were unable to attend the awards show which aired on ABC, live from the NOKIA Theater in Los Angeles. articles.title: The Afters 12 Days of Christmas Tour
articles.description: The AftersTHE AFTERS RING IN HOLIDAY SEASON WITH 12 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS TOUR “ Keeping Me Alive ” Used In Promotion for FOX’s “ The Secret Millionaire ” “ Keeping Me Alive ” is off of The Afters’ sophomore project Never Going Back to Ok Songs from “ Never Going Back to Ok ” were also used on the Rachael Ray show and Grey’s Anatomy as well as on Dr Phil.
articles.author: The M Collective

articles.title: New NOFX album in the works
articles.description: According to a bulletin from Descendents on their current status, drummer and producer Bill Stevenson is working on the next full length from NOFX. The bulletin doesn't give too much in the way of details but NOFX has been touring extensively in the past few years since the release of 2006's Wolves in Wolves' Clothing. Stevenson was also behind the boards for that album.
articles.author: Sputnikmusic.com

articles.title: GREAT WHITE Comes Out On Top In 'VH1 Classic Celebrity Bowl-Off'
articles.description: , and The Doug Flutie, Jr Foundation for Autism. The rockers were awarded with trophies and VH1 bowling shirts. VH1 Classic's Rock Autism campaign is designed to help educate parents and build awareness about autism and to raise funds for a variety of autism research, advocacy and support organizations.

articles.title: Mae To Release Three EP’s in 2009; Free Song Available Now
articles.description: Every month in 2009 Mae will be bringing you a new song that is part of a bigger story. These songs are like the months that make up the year. These songs are like years that make up a life.

articles.title: Aerosmith frontman performs with Trans-Siberian Orchestra in New York, New Jersey
articles.description: Commented Trans Siberian Orchestra guitarist Chris Caffery ( also of Savatage ) : [ Playing with Steven Tyler at the Nassau Coliseum and Izod Arena ] was extra special for a ton of reasons. Headlining our fifth show there and having Steven Tyler as a special guest was so incredible! Fan filmed video footage of Tyler's December 12, 2008 performance with the Trans Siberian Orchestra at the Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum in Uniondale, New York can be viewed below.
articles.author: Metalrage.com Frontpage News

articles.title: Anberlin - New Surrender
articles.description: Anberlin have released many albums over the past six years according to their official page, this is however the first I have heard of them. The power and dominance these songs have are remarkable. In the coming year Anberlin are going to be making a large impact on the music industry.
articles.author: RoomThirteen.com CD Reviews
